footer: Empty pages are not displayed. Click or move the cursor and press Enter to open the page.
please-select-pages: Select your Logseq graph folder (must contain 'pages')
sidebar-placeholder: Select a card to preview here
subpages-deeper-notice: (No direct children. Showing deeper descendant pages.)
sample-text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog 0123456789
note-fonts: Note: If a weight not provided by Google Fonts is specified, a nearby available weight will be used automatically.
toggle-remove-macros-help: Remove non-query macros like {{renderer ...}} or custom macros
toggle-normalize-tasks-help: Convert task keywords (TODO, DOING, DONE, LATER, NOW, WAITING, CANCELLED) to markdown checkboxes
mode-choose-folder-desc: Folder Mode: Pick your Logseq graph folder (with 'pages') to browse without Logseq.
